skchr_fuze_2.name: 霰射炸药
desc:
When skill is activated, Fuze places a Cluster Charge on a Ranged tile ahead, which then explodes on nearby passable ground tiles behind the Ranged tile 5 times, each dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to nearby targets
<@ba.rem>This skill can only be activated when facing a Ranged tile with passable ground tiles behind it, and can only be used 3 times per deployment</>

skchr_iana_2.name: 全知者的战术
desc:
When skill is activated, Iana immediately removes <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</> from nearby enemies for <@ba.vup>{anti_invisible_duration}</> seconds and swaps to [Substitute]
Within the duration of the skill, increase ASPD<@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</> and gain <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>

skchr_ela_2.name: 震荡坚守
desc:
Passive: When Grzmot Mines are activated, <$ba.stun>Stun</> all nearby targets for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
When skill is activated, Ela deploys a mobile shield, DEF<@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</> and reducing Attack Range. Attacks deal splash Physical daamge and ignore <@ba.vup>{def_penetrate_fixed}</> DEF
When skill ends, immediately gain 1 Grzmot Mine
